article_title: Bustos visits Cook plant after voting for repeal of medical devices excise tax

article_metadata.description: Just one day after her vote to support the Protect Medical Innovation Act repealing the excise tax on medical devices, Congresswoman Cheri Bustos (IL-17) visited the Cook Medical Group plant in Canton to visit with employees and show support for businesses working to provide jobs in local communities.
article_metadata.author: Larry Eskridge

og.description: Just one day after her vote to support the Protect Medical Innovation Act repealing the excise tax on medical devices, Congresswoman Cheri Bustos (IL-17)
